title: TWAP Pools Configuration
description: Sample configuration for TWAP pool validation. Discovered pools should be validated for sufficient observation cardinality using discover-twap-pools.mjs

pools.note: WETH/USDC 0.05% pool on Base - validate cardinality before use
cbETH/USDC 0.05% pool on Base - example only

notes: Pool addresses must be valid Ethereum addresses (0x followed by 40 hex characters)
Use scripts/discover-twap-pools.mjs to find pools with sufficient observation history
Minimum required fields: symbol, pool, dex
Optional fields: fee, quote, liquidity, note
The 'pools' array can also be provided directly as a JSON array (without the wrapper object)
Always verify pool addresses before using in production
